events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but my package still hasn't arrived, and the tracking info hasn't updated in days.
The system has categorized the case under 'Delivery Delay' based on the customer's description of a late shipment.
Customer support agent John has been assigned to handle the delivery delay case for further assistance.
Hello! I'm John from customer support. I understand your order hasn't arrived yet. Let's get this sorted out for you.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can check the status of your package?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and the shipping address is 456 Elm Street, Apt 12, Springfield.
I've contacted the shipping company and found your package is delayed due to weather. It should arrive within 3 more days.
Thanks for the update. I appreciate you looking into it. I hope it gets here soon.
We have noted the delay, and your package is now expected to arrive within three days. We will keep monitoring it until delivery.
Just following up to confirm that your package has arrived. Please let us know if there is anything else we can do.
Since your package was delivered successfully, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
